messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: Seeing unschoolers in action.
messages.msgSnippet: Anyway, if you are....I m in Corvallis and there are several unschooling veterans here that you can spend some time with. Here s a link to some of my writing.
messages.messageBody:
Anyway, if you are....I'm in Corvallis and there are several
unschooling veterans here that you can spend some time with. Here's a link
to some of my writing. That will give you an idea of who I am and where I've
been. I love sharing with new unschoolers.
============================


Thanks Mary! I was in Oregon--Portland. But for the moment I'm on the
Washington coast, just across the Columbia from Astoria. Maybe sometime I
could make it down your way for a visit though. I do have some friends I
like to see from time in Silverton. Also, my husband and I have been
considering Corvallis as a place to try and buy some land. I appreciate the
invitation to spend some time with some other Oregon Unschoolers. I don't
know when I could do that, but think I could sometime in the next few weeks.
In the meantime, I'll check out the link you shared with me.

Thanks again!
Andrea

messages.subject: Re: Seeing unschoolers in action.
messages.msgSnippet: ... for awhile.  This list is the closest I can get to that, though. (And it s pretty darned helpful!)  Still, I d love to go to the conference...sigh...
messages.messageBody:
>>I, too, would love to know other homeschoolers who have been at it
for awhile. This list is the closest I can get to that, though.
(And it's pretty darned helpful!) Still, I'd love to go to the
conference...sigh...>>

Aren't you in Oregon, Andrea? Eugene maybe? I don't always connect
names and posts, so forgive me if I got that wrong.

Anyway, if you are....I'm in Corvallis and there are several
unschooling veterans here that you can spend some time with. Here's a
link to some of my writing. That will give you an idea of who I am
and where I've been. I love sharing with new unschoolers.

http://sandradodd.com/marygold

Life is good.
~Mary

messages.subject: Seeing unschoolers in action.
messages.msgSnippet: I, too, would love to know other homeschoolers who have been at it for awhile.  This list is the closest I can get to that, though.  (And it s pretty darned
messages.messageBody:
I, too, would love to know other homeschoolers who have been at it for
awhile. This list is the closest I can get to that, though. (And it's
pretty darned helpful!) Still, I'd love to go to the conference...sigh...

~Andrea
